title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a lock in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lock in a dream: A lock is one of the safe means that people use to lock their stores and homes when they travel, but when a lock appears to a person in his dreams, it has different meanings and interpretations. When a prisoner sees his dream, this means that he is leaving prison, and if the only person saw him in his dream, this means that his marriage will be soon, and many of the interpretations that we know in detail for you in this article. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin about seeing a lock in a dream. Ibn Sirin says that when a prisoner sees that there is A lock in a dream and he opens it, this is good news of his release from prison. When the lock of the Apocalypse is wooden, unfortunately, this is a bad vision. When a person sees that the lock is on the door of the house, it means that this person is very afraid of his wife and cares for her. Whoever sees in his dream Having a lock with a set of keys, these keys represent the woman in the dreamer’s life. The person may see himself trying to open the lock and cannot do so. This means that it is difficult for him to manage the affairs of his life and he cannot control them. When one sees himself making a lock, it shows righteousness and a vision of piety. When a person sees himself in a dream carrying a large, heavy clip hanging around his neck, this is a very unpopular vision. Interpretation of seeing a lock in one dream: If an unmarried girl sees that she can open a lock, this is a sign of her marriage. But if she sees that she is tied up and can open the lock And breaking the lock, this is evidence that he enjoys freedom. This vision is also evidence of achieving goals and dreams. Interpretation of seeing a lock in a dream for a married woman: It is said that seeing a lock in a married woman’s dream is a humane matter in all circumstances, unless the lock is made of wood. If she sees A married woman sees a lock in her dream, so it is good for her to get pregnant. Interpretation of opening a lock in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees that she is opening a lock, this is a sign of comfort and an end to suffering. This vision also indicates an easy and safe birth. Interpretation of a vision of opening a lock. Jurists explained that seeing a lock opened in The dream indicates the arrival of goodness and judgment. If a man sees his lock on his door, this is a sign of extreme jealousy towards his family. But if a person believes that he cannot open the lock, this is evidence of problems and crises. It is said that an iron lock is a sign of freedom from anxiety. A wooden lock He has poor eyesight. Other evidence for seeing a lock in a dream: Seeing a lock in a dream means that you reach security and turn fear into safety. This vision also indicates the achievement of goals and desires. However, if the lock is made of wood, this is evidence of lies and deception. The jurists agreed that seeing a lock in a dream indicates greatness and pride. Other interpretations of seeing a lock: When a person sees that he is trying to open the door and is able to open it in a dream, this means that there is a prayer for him that will be answered. Whoever sees in his hand a set of different keys for someone’s lock, this means that the fortuneteller has some power and an important position. If a person finds it difficult to open the lock for a long time, this is a bad vision that will reach him or it will be bad.

title: Interpretation of dreams about engagement and marriage by Ibn Sirin and Nabulsi, interpretation of dreams about engagement and marriage with someone I do not know and dreaming about him, interpretation of engagement and marriage with someone I know

preview.html: What are the interpretations of the dream of engagement and marriage by Ibn Sirin? The interpretation of the dream of engagement and marriage has connotations that may surprise the dreamers when they know it. The vision may indicate goodness and food, and at other times it shows misfortunes and sorrows, knowing that the great and modern jurists paid great attention to this dream and gave it to hundreds of jurists. . Explanations. According to the elements of the vision, read these paragraphs and you will find in detail the interpretation of your dream. Interpretation of the dream of engagement and marriage. When the dreamer sees that he is one of the guests at a beautiful and happy engagement party, he is a person full of vitality and optimism. He sees that the coming days will bring him many joys, and he also intends to change many things in his life until he reaches... The upper ranks of couples in a beautiful and happy engagement party. He is an optimistic person and believes that the coming days will bring him the path to success. Among the symbols that are interpreted this way in many visions is the symbol of engagement or marriage, which means that a single woman who is not engaged if She who sees this dream will celebrate her engagement or marriage, in addition to her singleness. Whoever sees in a dream that he got married and his wife is beautiful, this is his next life, which means that he will live in a beautiful world full of success and marry a woman who may resemble the one he saw in the dream. Visions of marriage mean happiness in life Provided that it is a luxurious wedding, full of wealth and free of all noise, dancing and annoying singing. Seeing a marriage or engagement with a handsome man actually means a happy married life, while marrying an ugly man and wearing his clothes means an unhappy marriage and a difficult life. Interpretation of a dream about engagement Marriage by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted this symbol according to the religion of the woman whom the dreamer married. Whoever marries a woman who does not believe in Islam and belongs to Judaism, will not apply the provisions of religion in his life and will be pursued after money. Whatever its source, the comprehensive vision shows money coming from illegal professions. As for whoever sees a Christian woman and loves her and decides to marry her in a dream, he is living a lie, meaning he hates the truth and deceives people in trade (if he is a merchant) in exchange for a lot. Of money. When a dreamer marries a woman whose behavior is offensive and who is known to be an adulteress, he commits adultery and commits adultery with the women in his life. When a young man marries in his dream, he becomes the owner of a lot of money in reality, and marrying a fat and beautiful woman means many years of prosperity and livelihood. As for his marriage to A sick or ugly woman, he finds difficulties and material concerns in his life, as he suffers from sadness and difficulty achieving the goal. Interpretation of dreams for engagement and marriage for a single woman. Interpretation of a dream about engagement and marriage for a girl indicates a high career path or academic success that makes her feel proud and elevated among people, provided that she sees herself as a beautiful bride. Her dress is white and appropriate for her. If a Virgo sees a ring for her engagement or wedding and wears it and it is as she wants, then he is a husband who will bring her all the specifications she wants. If one engagement or wedding party was annoying and you were very happy with it, she will live in distress and painful sadness and may suffer on the health front.

title: Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of Ibn Sirin who sees an elephant in a dream, the elephant is a mammal characterized by its huge size and we find that its weight reaches thousands of kilograms and what distinguishes its shape is the large ear and the long tube, and the sleeper can see this animal in his dream, admire his vision and be confused about the interpretation of the vision he saw, and for this we will explain to you through the following encyclopedia describing the interpretation of the interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream for a single girl, a married woman and a pregnant woman, so follow us. Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream by Ibn Sirin The great scholar Muhammad bin Sirin says that seeing an elephant in a dream indicates the arrival of happiness to the dreamer's life. If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is riding an elephant, this is a sign that he has gained a prestigious position in society, and this vision also indicates ease of dealing. If the owner of the dream sees in his dream that he is riding an elephant, and the darkness of night prevails in the place, this is good news of victory over enemies. Watching the movie Hit in a dream indicates a blessing in livelihood. Whoever dreams that he is talking to an elephant, this is a sign that he will meet a person of status Prominent in society. Interpretation of seeing a large elephant in a dream for a single woman Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing a large elephant in an unmarried girl's dream indicates that her wedding date is approaching. This vision also has commendable connotations and heralds the coming of goodness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a small elephant in a dream for a single woman If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that it is small in size, this is a sign of the approaching date of her engagement to a man she loves. This vision also indicates that the girl will receive a wide and blessed livelihood in the coming days. Interpretation of seeing an elephant in a dream for a married woman Dream interpretation scholars say that if a married woman sees an elephant in her dream, this is a good vision that indicates the goodness that she will enjoy in her life. Seeing a white elephant in a married woman's dream portends pregnancy soon. If a married woman sees an elephant and it is covered in pink, this is a sign of emotional stability in her life. A black elephant in a married woman's dream indicates that she will get a lot of money. If a married woman sees an elephant in her dream and sleeps, this is a sign of happiness and good news that will reach her home. If a married woman sees herself fighting an elephant in a dream, this is evidence of Stability of her marital life. As for if a married woman sees in her dream that she is killing an elephant, this is an unpleasant vision, and indicates the deterioration of her health, and this vision also indicates that she hears sad news. Interpretation of an elephant in a dream for a pregnant woman If a married woman sees an elephant in her dream, this is a sign that she will give birth to a male, and this vision also indicates that her child will enjoy health and well-being. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing an elephant in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates that the child she will give birth to will be fair to her and her husband and will bring her good. The elephant’s trunk in a dream If the sleeper sees in his dream that an elephant is hitting him with its trunk, this is a good vision indicating that the dreamer will gain benefit in his life,

title: Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a man

preview.html: If he helps a pregnant woman in a dream, it interprets the goodness he sees in his life, and looking at a pregnant woman in a dream indicates happiness and joy. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried girl sees that she is looking at a pregnant woman in a dream and she did not know her before. It appears that she will get rid of the bad things she sees in her life and live. Also, a dream about a pregnant woman who knows that the girl is unmarried should have given birth in front of her and helped her. This means that she will approach the date of her marriage to a good and righteous man, God willing. An unmarried woman who sees that the pregnant woman She was very tired in front of her in a dream. It indicates that during this period of time she will face some difficult things in her life. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means that a pregnant woman asked her for help in a dream a lot. It is a sign that she will feel very sad in her life during this time. See also : Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dreamInterpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman saw in a dream that the pregnant woman was tired in front of her in the dream. It explains that he will face some annoying things during this time. If the married woman is looking for a pregnant woman in a dream and cannot see her This is a sign that she will go through a difficult period in her life, and she will try to escape from it. As for seeing a pregnant woman in a dream giving birth, she was being helped in the dream by a married woman. A clear sign that she will get rid of many of the problems she was going through in her life, and God knows best. A married woman in a dream is that he is looking at a pregnant woman, and he knows her well in the dream. Here is a clear interpretation that she will live happily, God willing. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a divorced womanIf a divorced woman sees in a dream that a pregnant woman was next to her in a dream and she became sad. It indicates that she She will see some difficult things in her life during this period as well. If she knows the pregnant divorced woman in the dream, and talks to her a lot in the dream. It explains that she will see many new things in her life, and she will be very happy, God willing. And the divorced woman who is looking for a pregnant woman in her dream will You stand by her side and help her. It is an indication of the goodness of this divorced woman in her life, and God knows best. Seeing a divorced woman sees in a dream a pregnant woman who is very tired and preparing to give birth. It indicates that she will encounter good things in her life, as she will live happily ever after. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman in a dream for a man and its meaning. If he sees The dreamer looks at the wife of an unknown pregnant woman in a dream and is happy. This indicates that he will live a happy life in his life during this period, God willing. And the dreamer’s vision in a dream is that he sees a pregnant woman, and he becomes very tired in the dream. It indicates that he will see some difficult things in His life at this time, and God knows best. Likewise, the dreamer who gave birth to a pregnant woman in a dream, and he was looking at the child in the dream. An indication of seeing goodness and nourishment in his life at this time with great happiness and comfort. And if the dreamer sees a pregnant woman in a dream, then she seeks

It indicates that he will see some difficult things in His life at this time, and God knows best. title: Learn about the interpretation of engagement and marriage in a dream and the interpretation of a dream about disagreement in engagement or marriage in a dream

preview.html: Engagement or marriage in a dream is one of the visions seen by a large number of people, men and women, especially a person who has never been married. Therefore, some search for an interpretation of this vision and what it has of praiseworthy or other meanings. Several dream interpretation scholars, such as Ibn Sirin bin Shaheen and Al-Nabulsi, interpret this. The dream depends on whether the dreamer is male or female, as well as the marital status, as well as the situation in which the dreamer saw the wedding. Interpretation of a dream about engagement and marriage in a dream. What is the interpretation of engagement and marriage in a dream? The indication of seeing engagement or marriage in a dream is psychological comfort, diligence, commitment, and changes in the person, which may be the dreamer’s entry into a new life, and marriage in a dream can symbolize religion or families. Some scholars interpreted the dream of marrying an unknown woman to mean the dreamer’s death and moving to the abode of truth. However, if the dreamer is an intelligent and wise person fit for administration or emirate, he will reach a high position befitting his abilities. Whereas if the dreamer sees preparations for the wedding in a dream, this is a sign of promotion in the country. Working and obtaining high positions or an indicator of a good reputation. Both Al-Nabulsi and Ibn Shaheen agreed on the interpretation of the dreamer’s dream about his engagement or wedding ceremony as evidence of good behavior and the acquisition of prestigious positions. They also said about seeing the books of the Book in a dream that it is an indication of the covenant between the dreamer and his Lord. Marriage in a dream to a well-known girl or woman indicates success, superiority, and obtaining the desires that the dreamer wanted to achieve. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he is marrying a girl who has never been married before, that is, a rational virgin, then this dream symbolizes the world. Fertile, especially if the woman whom the dreamer married has a high status of beauty. But if the man sees himself engaged or entering into a marriage contract with a weak or ugly-faced woman, then this dream is a bad omen for the singer, as it indicates that this year will not be good, that is, it will be like that. A year of drought. Engaging or marrying a relative in a dream without a mahram has desirable meanings for the dreamer, as it promises him a relationship, friendliness, and understanding between him and his family and friends, and that he will have a good reputation with the dreamer. All. Whoever concludes a contract with a woman in a dream, and after a while God dies, the meaning of this dream is that the dreamer has a profession or job, from which he will only suffer hardship. And whoever dreams in his sleep that he is engaged to a Jewish woman and marries her, this symbolizes the sins that he commits from behind. His profession or craft, and that his sins have increased, and this dream is a warning to him that he must remain. Away from this art and look for another job. What is the interpretation of engagement and marriage in a dream by Ibn Sirin? The respected scholar Ibn Shirin interpreted seeing engagement and marriage in a dream as a symbol of family peace and stability. As for the one who sees himself in his dream that he is present at the wedding of one of his family members or friends Close people, this indicates friendliness, love and harmony between him and that person. When a man watches his engagement and marries a woman unknown to him, the dream is for him together

title: Interpretation of a dream about someone looking at you in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Seeing a dream about someone you love, Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he is talking to his beloved, this may be one of some of the worries and problems that that person may suffer from in his future periods. Seeing someone you love while you are far away. Dreaming with someone you love while she is far away from you indicates problems in her life in general. Or She is facing disagreements with her lover in particular. Talking to someone she loves while she is away from the complex denotes getting rid of sadness, anxiety and problems and restoring her happy life with her fiancé. Seeing someone she loves while traveling in reality shows an abundance of wealth and a feeling of optimism. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a lover at home. Seeing the girl you love in The house indicates that she thinks a lot about this person and is constantly busy thinking about her husband. See the point. A person she loves is an abundant sign of goodness and an indication of the girl’s marriage soon. It symbolizes the presence of a loved one in the house where there is no sign of his return from the trip. Interpretation of dreams for someone you love looking at you and smiling. Seeing someone you love He smiles at you, and this dream is repeated several times, a sign of goodness, humiliation, and a lot of sustenance. The girl who sees her lover smiling at her in the dream is a sign of success at work and excellence in the coming period. Divorced. Whoever dreams of someone smiling is a sign of getting rid of problems and losing the sadness and anxiety that you are experiencing. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love traveling. See the point. Travel with someone you love in In a dream, it led to disagreements with him and him staying away from him for a period of time. Seeing a loved one traveling in a divorced woman’s dream symbolizes forgetting the past. A pregnant woman who sees the traveler returning in a dream indicates the approaching date of childbirth without pain. Interpretation of seeing someone she loves and being ignored. It indicates seeing ignoring someone she loves. In a dream, there are those who He cares about her and pursues her. Seeing someone ignoring you repeatedly in a dream is evidence that the person is conspiring against the dreamer. Seeing neglect in a dream means losses or the beginning of a relationship that ends in failure. Interpretation of a dream about someone you love in my house for singles. A free girl. The person she loves at home is a sign that he helps her get rid of problems. The woman indicates A married woman who sees someone she loves in a dream indicates problems and disagreements with her husband. Seeing someone in a dream that the dreamer loves is a sign of alienation in relationships with close people. Interpretation of dreams about someone you love talking to you and laughing. They symbolize watching. Talking to someone you love. Laughing with him about the dreamer’s control over his relationship with his life partner. Talking to someone you love is In a dream and feeling sad is a sign of hearing bad news. A man who sees someone telling him how much he loves him is evidence of the opposite and that this person hates the dreamer and is trying to cause trouble. Interpretation of dreams of someone talking to me. Seeing someone who likes to talk to you on the phone is a sign that he is talking to you soon to ask for help. The man you are talking to With his wife on the phone in a dream, it is evidence that she feels she needs him very much. Talking to someone she loves in a dream brings a lot of good skin to the dreamer. Seeing a former lover in a married dream. There is a married woman who sees in a dream her former lover or whomever she loves.

title: Interpretation of dreams about fire burning a person by Ibn Sirin with all its interpretations

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a fire that burns a person: Seeing fire in a dream is disturbing, but...Interpretation of a dream about a fire that burns a person. In reality, a person is afraid of this dream, but the interpretation of the dream varies greatly from one person to another and according to the visions. Interpretation of a dream about a fire that burns a person. Send a website to The Internet has different interpretations of a dream about a fire that burns a person, whether he is single, pregnant, married, or other interpretations that differ from one person to another. The interpretation of seeing a fire burning a person in a dream indicates that this person will obtain a high position or status. Seeing a person burning sometimes indicates that he In temptation or trial, but if he extinguishes that fire, it shows his salvation and overcoming that temptation. Seeing feet burning with fire in a dream means overcoming the problems and obstacles facing the dreamer and overcoming the difficulties of the world. Whoever sees himself in fire in a dream but the fire does not harm him, indicates The extent of his victory over his enemies. Seeing a person burning with fire on his face in a dream shows how wonderful this person is. Interpretation of the dream of fire that burns a person. In a dream about the face, it shows that this person always prefers to appear in an appropriate manner in front of people. Interpretation of seeing fire burning a person by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of the dream of fire Which burns a person. Ibn Sirin explained that seeing fire burning a person in a dream indicates many meanings that carry goodness and goodness, and it also warns of existing events as a result of actions that occurred in the past. In the dreamer’s vision of a person burning in his house, this indicates that there will be many changes for the people of that The house in the coming period, some of these changes include good and bad. If you see it burning outside the house, this indicates that the people of the house have been liberated from the evil and damage that the people of the house suffered and that they will find reassurance after the hardships are over. Interpretation of seeing a fire burning dead. Interpretation of a dream about a fire that burns Human: A dead acquaintance of the dreamer indicates that this person has committed bad deeds in his life. Dreaming of a dead person burning in a fire indicates how much this person needs to pray and ask forgiveness from the dreamer, otherwise the dreamer will make up for the injustice caused by the deceased. But in the event that you see A dead person burning in a fire in a dream, but the dreamer does not know him, this indicates that the dreamer has committed sins and transgressions, and this dream serves as a warning to return to the right path. If the dead person is seen burning in a fire to warm himself from it, then this indicates his steadfastness. Interpretation of seeing a fire burning a person. Some commentators consider this an interpretation. Dreaming of a fire burning a person: In the dream of an unmarried woman, this is a sign of her future husband and that this marriage will be based on respect and love. Seeing fire burning a person in one dream brings many changes in the girl’s life in the coming period. But if the girl sees a person burning and trying to For him to hold her hand to save him, this indicates that there is someone who has good feelings towards this girl and wants to come to her and confess his love to her. In the event that the girl sees someone walking through the fire without

title: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for single and married women

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream is one of the most important visions that has confused many people and they are trying to find an explanation for it. Seeing sheep in a dream varies depending on the person who sees them, and also varies according to the number of those sheep. Seeing a flock is not the same as seeing a ewe. To see a sheep in a dream means victory, and victory could be a victory over yourself and trying to tempt it to do good and stay away from evil, or victory in a battle with another person, such as winning a case from someone in whom I disagree. With you, this vision can also indicate repentance and return to God Almighty. As a person walking on a path that does not please Almighty God. This is a warning to him that he must repent and seek forgiveness for these actions that he is committing. Let us discover together the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women.Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sheep in a dream when you are single. And if an unmarried woman sees a sheep in her dream, this is evidence of the arrival of Good for that woman. Because seeing sheep is good news, but if a woman sees that she is slaughtering a sheep in a dream, this is evidence that this woman will be blessed by Almighty God with a good husband who fears God within her and will treat her well. This is evidence that some of this woman’s friends are conspiring against her, and she should beware of these friends. In order not to fall into an unfortunate consequence, and if an unmarried woman sees a flock of sheep in a dream. This is evidence that this woman was violating Sharia law, but God Almighty made her repent. This woman repented and returned to God Almighty, and asked Him for forgiveness for the work she had done. Interpretation of seeing a married sheep in a dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is tending many sheep, this is evidence that this woman protects her husband and his money and takes care of God Almighty in what he gets. But if the woman sees For a married woman, if a flock of sheep enters her house, she is the one who takes care of it. This is good news for this woman, but if this woman sees that she is slaughtering a sheep and then shearing it. This is evidence of evil for that woman, and that God Almighty will afflict her with her wealth, or with her children, in the event that one of them becomes injured or becomes ill, or her husband becomes ill, or if she divorces and marries her to another. Women. This is also bad evidence, and that this woman’s home and marital life are in danger, and she must take care of her affairs and correct the mistakes she has committed. To stabilize her marital life. Interpretation of seeing a sheep while you are pregnant in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees a sheep in a dream. This indicates that God will grant her many good things and that her birth is related to the great support that he and her entire family will receive, but if the pregnant woman sees a sheep in a dream. This is evidence that God Almighty will bless this woman with a boy, but if the pregnant woman sees in a dream that a flock of sheep has been struck, and that this woman has defeated them. This is evidence that this woman will face difficulties in the birth process, but God Almighty will save her from those dangers that she will face in the birth process, but if the pregnant woman sees that sheep are chasing her. This is evidence that this woman will face some difficulties

Let us discover together the interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream for single, married, and pregnant women.Interpretation of seeing a sheep in a dream. Interpretation of seeing sheep in a dream when you are single. And if an unmarried woman sees a sheep in her dream, this is evidence of the arrival of Good for that woman. Because seeing sheep is good news, but if a woman sees that she is slaughtering a sheep in a dream, this is evidence that this woman will be blessed by Almighty God with a good husband who fears God within her and will treat her well. This is evidence that some of this woman’s friends are conspiring against her, and she should beware of these friends. In order not to fall into an unfortunate consequence, and if an unmarried woman sees a flock of sheep in a dream. This is evidence that this woman was violating Sharia law, but God Almighty made her repent. This woman repented and returned to God Almighty, and asked Him for forgiveness for the work she had done. Interpretation of seeing a married sheep in a dream: If a married woman sees in her dream that she is tending many sheep, this is evidence that this woman protects her husband and his money and takes care of God Almighty in what he gets. This is good news for this woman, but if this woman sees that she is slaughtering a sheep and then shearing it. To stabilize her marital life. Interpretation of seeing a sheep while you are pregnant in a dream: If a pregnant woman sees a sheep in a dream.
